text: Jethro Pugh, Jr. (July 3, 1944 - January 7, 2015) was an American football player. He played as a defensive tackle and a defensive end in the National Football League (NFL) for the Dallas Cowboys from 1965 until 1978. Pugh retired on January 29, 1979. Pugh was born in Windsor, North Carolina. He attended Elizabeth City State University in Elizabeth City, North Carolina. Pugh died on January 7, 2015 in Dallas, Texas, aged 70. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American football defensive ends Category:American football defensive tackles Category:Dallas Cowboys players Category:Sportspeople from North Carolina
title: Jethro Pugh
